rows: Describe the business need of the lead briefly.
Describe the products you can offer to the lead.
Enter the potential revenue the lead can bring.
Specify the date when you expect to close the deal.
Change the channel if the lead needs to be transferred, for example to a partner.
Specify the group responsible for the lead.
Change the owner if another role is responsible for handling leads at theSales qualified leadstage.
html:
Field

Field value

Business case

Describe the business need of the lead briefly.

Product suggestions

Describe the products you can offer to the lead.

Potential value

Enter the potential revenue the lead can bring.

Expected close date

Specify the date when you expect to close the deal.

Sales channel

Change the channel if the lead needs to be transferred, for example to a partner.

Assignees group

Specify the group responsible for the lead.

Owner

Change the owner if another role is responsible for handling leads at the Sales qualified lead stage.
